00172             function                view( $Options )
00173             {
00174                   try
00175                   {

00226             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00227             {
00228                   try
00229                   {
00230                         if( strpos( $ProcessingString , '{not_read_messages_count}' ) !== false )
00231                         {
00232                               $Count = $this->PmsgAlgorithms->get_not_read_messages_count();
00233                               
00234                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{not_read_messages_count}' , $Count , $ProcessingString );
00235                         }
00236
